snippet.title: My View: Technology and engineering, the forgotten part of STEM education
snippet.description:
* Editor's note: Matt Walton a technology and engineering education teacher at Glen Allen High School in Henrico County, Virginia. He has a master's degree in education and a bachelor of science degree in technology education from North Carolina State University.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/02/02/us/my-view-technology-and-engineering-the-forgotten-part-of-stem-education/index.html

snippet.title: High-tech kit speeds athletes into new era
snippet.description:
* From hydrodynamic swimwear in the pool to lightweight carbon-fiber bicycles slicing through the air at the velodrome, the Olympic Games is once again shining a spotlight not only on the athletes, but also their kit.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/08/04/tech/innovation/olympics-technology-debate-future/index.html

snippet.title: Why I fought campaign contribution limit
snippet.description:
* The Supreme Court on Wednesday reinforced the nation's belief in freedom and its constitutional traditions with a ruling that upheld my challenge to a section of the federal election campaign law that restricted citizens' rights to express their views.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/03/opinion/mccutcheon-campaign-contribution-limits/index.html

snippet.title: How some colleges are offering free textbooks
snippet.description:
* College student Caitlin Ryen works two jobs to support herself and pay tuition at South Florida Community College. When a new semester rolls around, that usually means choosing which textbooks to buy, or not buying any at all, she says.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/18/living/open-textbooks-online-education-resources/index.html

snippet.title: What do we know about Russia's troop buildup on Ukraine's border?
snippet.description:
* Both Kiev and Washington say that Russian forces are massing in large numbers near Ukraine's eastern border -- and that they represent a threat to Ukraine and potentially to other former Soviet states.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/28/world/europe/russia-ukraine-troop-buildup/index.html

snippet.title: In wake of LAX shooting, TSA recommends checkpoint changes
snippet.description:
* The Transportation Security Administration is recommending a beefed-up police presence at TSA checkpoints and ticket counters during busy times at airports, the agency said in a report released Wednesday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/26/travel/tsa-airport-security/index.html

snippet.title: Hockey player breaks back, switches to figure skating
snippet.description:
* I'm relaxing at home on the couch watching TV, and everything seems to be about the Olympics. I can't seem to avoid the constant reminder of where I would like to have been at this moment: in Sochi, Russia.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/26/health/human-factor-max-aaron/index.html

snippet.title: Obama: U.S. and Europe united over Ukraine crisis
snippet.description:
* U.S. President Barack Obama on Wednesday again called for Russia to de-escalate the situation in Ukraine and warned of further isolation and "costs" if Moscow doesn't respond to the West's call for a change of course.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/26/politics/ukraine-crisis/index.html

snippet.title: Success is about more than money and power
snippet.description:
* On April 6, 2007, I woke up in the morning in a pool of blood. I had collapsed from exhaustion and hit my head on the corner of my desk, cutting my eye and breaking my cheekbone.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/25/opinion/huffington-redefining-success/index.html

snippet.title: Depression, anxiety: What worked for me
snippet.description:
* For more than a decade of my life, I struggled with debilitating anxiety, panic attacks and depression. And, like millions of people around the world, I longed to discover a magic pill to cure my ills and promise me nirvana.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/04/health/ramprasad-depression/index.html
